column4: hi.., if we use wine will all the programs run as good and/or quick as straight within windows?
some programs do, but most do not
so games, very important, will not then?!
im afraid most new games will not work with wine
i play Eve Online on wine, but a lot of games i have tried won't work
if you are a serious gamer, then I think you will be stuck with windows for a while mate
